message: Let's split it 60/40. I believe this is a fair offer to start with.
I think 55/45 is more fair, considering we both want a bigger share.
I understand you want a bigger share, but letting it depreciate further doesn't make sense. Let's settle for 55/45.
I see we're getting closer, but I still think I deserve a bit more. Meet me in the middle at 52/48.
